column4: hi - managed to boot with reaque disk - tried 'sudo mount -t ext3 /dev/hda /media/hda/' but got 'mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/hda, or too many mounted file systems' any ideas?
umm... I think you meant /dev/hda1 didn't you?
and probably /media/hda1, if it exists on your system
